adviseScripts.text: Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Who do you like better, me or Mica?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You.
Mica.
Me? Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: In that case, you're not allowed to get mad at me when I play tricks on Mica!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Oh, who am I kidding? You never do, anyway! Tee-hee!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Huh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Since Old-Timer has a soft spot for Mica...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You're willing to let me play pranks on you instead of her, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: It'll be loads of fun, I promise! Tee-hee!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I try to appease Belorta, who is way too excited about her trick ideas.
Old-Timer! I think I'm in trouble!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I have no idea which one to eat first! Should I eat the apple-flavored Splendamin...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: or the strawberry-flavored Splendamin?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Which one would you choose, Old-Timer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Apple.
Strawberry.
What a coincidence!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I must have read your mind, because that's the one I'm already eating!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Strawberry? Didn't expect that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Boo-hoo! I thought for sure you'd choose apple. That's why I went ahead and ate it all up!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I buy some more Splendamin and share with Belorta.
I want to show off our firecrackers for Neon.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What kind of firecracker you think is better?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Big, powerful ones?
Or those pretty ones that the Carronades like so much?
Big ones?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: All our firecrackers go off with big BOOM!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You don't seem to know much about our firecrackers, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Yeah! Obviously we have to choose the gorgeous ones!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: They are the pride of the Carronades!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Old-Timer, you know us well!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta tells me quite a lot about the Carronades' firecrackers.
I haven't seen Mica this angry in a long time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I should do something to put a smile back on her face. But what?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Buy her something yummy.
Stop playing tricks on her, just for one day.
Something yummy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Generally, I don't share my food with others.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text:
But, then again,
Mica is a special person to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: So, Old-Timer,
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: let's all go out for a great meal together, shall we?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: How could you say that?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: A day without playing tricks? Impossible!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Forget it. I'll just treat her to a great meal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Belorta about Mica.
Heeey, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I want to give Mica a good scare.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Should I dress up as a ghost,
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: or as a Rapture?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: How about a Rapture ghost?
Neither one is very scary.
A Rapture ghost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Mica isn't afraid of ghosts or Raptures on their own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Great idea, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Oh, you're saying that Mica won't be afraid of either of them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Good job! You can join my tricks on Mica in the future, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I come up with an idea that is sure to scare Mica.
Nobody ever comes to our Toy Store. I'm so bored, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Maybe holding an interesting event could bring in more people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What kind of events should we hold?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: A two-for-one offer on toys?
A two-for-one offer on tricks?
No! That's too boring!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Come up with something funnier!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You're a genius, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: One trick on the way in, and another on the way out!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Yeah! This is gonna be great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I make a plan to revitalize the Toy Store.
You're always so busy, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What do you even do on the holidays?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Rest at home.
Head out and have some fun.
Come on! Seriously?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Staying at home is SO boring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Let's have some fun together!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I knew it! I knew you were the outdoorsy type!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Woo-hoo!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Next time you have time off, let's go out and play together! Pinky swear!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I have a great time with Belorta while making holiday plans.
Hey, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I have a question for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: If you had the choice between getting eternal life but always being hungry...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: and a place where you are not hungry but can only live for a while,
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What would you choose?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: A short life with no hunger.
An eternal, hungry life.
Aha! We're the same, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: The most important thing in life is not to suffer from hunger, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What? Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I thought you would make the same choice I did.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta tells me many horrible stories about hunger.
So, what's your favorite meal?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Breakfast, lunch, or dinner?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: The important thing is what you eat, not when you eat.
I like every meal.
Whoa! I never thought about it that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What a brilliant idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: No matter what time I eat, I'm always happy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way. I was kind of hoping for a new answer, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, it's great that we're on the same page!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I have a nice and lively discussion with Belorta about food.
Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: They say the weather is gonna be beautiful tomorrow! What kind of things should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Light up some firecrackers with Mica.
Play tricks on Mica.
Tomorrow morning?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Firecrackers may be fun at any time of day...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: But they look better at night. So, I'll wait until nighttime, then light up the sky!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You got me, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I was already planning to "play" with Mica tomorrow morning!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I chat with Belorta for a while and look forward to a nice day tomorrow.
Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: If you could take just one thing to a deserted island,
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: what would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Sustenance is paramount, so large quantities of canned food.
I can't stand being bored, so probably a cellphone or laptop.
You put eating above all else as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You and I think alike!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: But what would happen when you got hungry?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: You can't eat a laptop...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I talk about our desert island survival strategies.
Hey, how do you relieve stress?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Eating something delicious.
I meditate.
Too right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Eating is the ultimate stress reliever.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Whenever you're starting to feel the pressure, give me a call.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: We can go hog wild on some delicious grub together!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Sounds kinda boring...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I feel like it'd only add more stress on top of how you're already feeling.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I talk about ways to relieve stress.
Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer night or day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Day.
Night.
Daytime can be nice, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I prefer nighttime, because that's when you can set off fireworks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Great minds think alike!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I prefer nighttime as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: That's when you can set off fireworks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I discuss the pros and cons of day and night.
Are there any foods that you dislike?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: No.
I'm not big on vegetables.
Yep, you're a foodie just like me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: It doesn't matter what it is, it all tastes great to us.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Two human garbage disposals, that's what we are!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I was surprised to hear that you're a bit of a picky eater.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Vegetables can be delicious if you give them a chance!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I talk about food.
Food that you've cooked yourself
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: always tastes better. I wonder why...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Are you a good cook, Old-Timer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Cooking is a hobby for me.
I can barely boil water.
All right! You should cook up something special for me then!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: My own personal chef!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I can't wait to see what you make me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: That makes two of us.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: How about you and I learn together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I searched for mouth-watering recipes.
Old-Timer! Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Mint chocolate is all the rage these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Do you like it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'm a mint chocolate fanatic.
I'm not a huge fan.
I knew you'd say that. You're just like me, there's nothing you dislike!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I had some mint chocolate ice cream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: It was absolutely delicious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What?! No way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: There's nothing better than mint chocolate ice cream!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I have a conversation about mint chocolate.
What are you in the mood for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Setting off fireworks together.
Having a nice meal together.
Hehehe, I was thinking that as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: We're gonna have a blast!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'm gonna show you some incredible fireworks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to, but I just ate.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Although I could eat more if I put my mind to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: How about we watch some fireworks while I let everything digest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I figure out which fireworks to set off.
Hey, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'm thinking of creating a bucket list.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: What's on yours?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: To try new foods all around the world.
Travel the world after reclaiming the surface.
Oh my gosh, just thinking about that gets me pumped!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'm going to add that too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: We can go on a culinary world tour together!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I'm not super interested in travel.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Unless it's traveling to eat, that is!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I compare and contrast our bucket lists.
Mica and I came up with nicknames for each other today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: If you were to give the two of us a nickname,
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: what would you call us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Baby pig sisters.
Firecrackers
Hmmm... I may be a baby pig, but Mica isn't...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'll ask Mica!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Not bad!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: That fits Mica and me to a T!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I've got to go tell Mica!
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I spend time coming up with more nicknames.
Can I ask you a question?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: How would you feel if your close friend died?
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Mica will always be with you.
I would feel as if a part of me died as well.
I certainly hope so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'd be bored stiff without Mica.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'm gonna go hang out with her today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I don't think that would make Mica very happy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: I'd rather not think about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Belorta

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and I have a conversation about death.
